overview: Kali Roses, Alina Lopez, Judy Jolie, and Kendra Spade, are hanging out and enjoying each other's company in a bedroom. Resting in bed, Kendra Spade starts mumbling and talking to herself. Her friend Sabina Rouge realizes that Kendraâ€™s dreaming about HER! That much excites Sabina since she never knew Kendra was into girls. Kenzie Reeves and Abella Danger were once inseparable best friends until Abella pushed her away because of an intense crush on her. Kenzie loves her and if she's going to try anything with a girl, she wants to do it with Abella.
title: Naughty Bedroom Party
